Rural healthcare is a critical issue for #TX13!

That's why I'm co-sponsoring the Stopping Doctor Shortages Act ‚Äî to close the loophole & bring more doctors to rural areas in TX.

Since 2007, a federal program (PSLF) has provided student loan forgiveness to doctors who complete 10 years of service to a non-profit (typically rural) hospital.

Nearly every state in the country benefits from the program, except for Texas due to a regulatory loophole.
